response.overview: "FUCK  RULF (19) meets ZIGGY (38) in his car to have sex. The attraction is promising until ZIGGY’s homophobia crashes into RULF's progressive ideals. After RULF points out ZIGGY’s self-contradictions, a boner-killing unease surfaces and ZIGGY slips into a guilt spiral.  The pair question their predicament. A flamboyant radio ad lifts the tension as they laugh into one another. They reconsider their mutual attractions before finally testing the car's suspension.  FUCK"
response.title: ASL
